name: Aditya Prakash
position: A poet finding rhythm in Data Science

current_company.name: Barclays
current_company.title: A poet finding rhythm in Data Science

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: •  Implemented a time series forecasting algorithm Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) in PySpark for sales data prediction.•  Used Apache Spark API in Python as the computational engine in order to have better scalability and overall faster runtime.•  Integrated spark cluster with elastic-search data repository which led to real-time search results for output generation.
experience.description_html: •  Implemented a time series forecasting algorithm Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) in PySpark for sales data prediction.•  Used Apache Spark API in Python as the computational engine in order to have better scalability and overall faster runtime.•  Integrated spark cluster with elastic-search data repository which led to real-time search results for output generation. <!---->

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: •  Interned in data science and analytics team in micro lending fintech firm providing unsecured loans to SMEs based in Delhi-NCR.•  Segmented Delinquent accounts based on their Payment Behavior and Risk profile leading to targeted action in collection.•  Provided Business Intelligence regarding monthly movement of delinquent accounts and strategy performance to follow.•  Designed and created Portfolio Monitoring Frameworks in tableau server using MySQL for live data extraction.•  Created visually impactful Tableau dashboards using calculated fields, dimensions, crosstabs and charts.
experience.description_html: •  Interned in data science and analytics team in micro lending fintech firm providing unsecured loans to SMEs based in Delhi-NCR.•  Segmented Delinquent accounts based on their Payment Behavior and Risk profile leading to targeted action in collection.•  Provided Business Intelligence regarding monthly movement of delinquent accounts and strategy performance to follow.•  Designed and created Portfolio Monitoring Frameworks in tableau server using MySQL for live data extraction.•  Created visually impactful Tableau dashboards using calculated fields, dimensions, crosstabs and charts.
